overview: A spin-off of the famous hit TV series based in New York. ‘Porn in the City’ introduces you to 4 highly sexed-up young women who love to shop, party and fuck! Watch Lucy Lee and her friends play hard, living out their fantasies as they screw gangsters, detectives and a mysterious lesbian… because these babes asses are the city’s best hot spots!
tagline: These babes asses are the city’s best hot spots!
title: Porn in the City
